name: Poissonpate (Elysioh)
description:
The day his nest is attacked by the terrible Boing,
Poissonpate finds himself forced to flee to a safe place.
Transform yourself into aquatic and terrestrial form to reach your end.
Help the Poissonpate in this game reminding the coloring of a child.

Music : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_77_B6u7eTRHAdrGCn5MgA
